about_the_game:
Project Nyx is an experimental class-based sci-fi multiplayer shooter that features seamless transitions between frenzied ground combat and chaotic six-degrees-of-freedom space battles. Defy gravity using the technology of a distant future as you blast your way through diverse environments and game modes. Master an entirely new playstyle and revel in the insane moment-to-moment gameplay.

Please note that this demo represents a much older prototype version of Project Nyx that was freshened up to give you a taste of what's to come. It is not feature-complete, has a few bugs and issues, and is nowhere near as polished as it should be. However, it offers a full game loop and two game modes to play with your friends. The Project Nyx remake is underway and features a ground-up rework of the core systems and gameplay. Expect far cleaner gameplay, better movement, new weapons, redesigned classes, smoother multiplayer, vastly improved UX (better menus, graphics settings, key rebinding support, etc), and more!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of violence related to shooting and incapacitating opponents within a multiplayer setting. Light blood splatter can be seen upon shooting an enemy. However, there are NO depictions of extreme gore.

Defy gravity using the technology of a distant future as you blast your way through diverse environments and game modes. Master an entirely new playstyle and revel in the insane moment-to-moment gameplay.

Please note that this demo represents a much older prototype version of Project Nyx that was freshened up to give you a taste of what's to come. It is not feature-complete, has a few bugs and issues, and is nowhere near as polished as it should be. However, it offers a full game loop and two game modes to play with your friends. The Project Nyx remake is underway and features a ground-up rework of the core systems and gameplay. Expect far cleaner gameplay, better movement, new weapons, redesigned classes, smoother multiplayer, vastly improved UX (better menus, graphics settings, key rebinding support, etc), and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Project Nyx is an experimental sci-fi multiplayer shooter that merges frenzied ground combat and chaotic zero-G space battles into one seamless experience. Warp reality. Defy gravity. Push the limits.
